results.content:
Trying to be completely honest: This is not a "course" per se, but more of a very long "pair programming" session.  

The pros are that after watching the videos, you will have an idea of what Angular, Ionic and LoopBack are about, and what can be done with it.  

The con is that, during the course you are mainly following the author while he creates a LoopBack, an Angular and a Ionic application, going step by step.  

Nevertheless, at the end of the course you will leave only with the idea of what can be done, but without having *learned* the concepts behind what is done. 

In summary, you will learn the WHAT, but won't get into the WHY or the HOW of things. 

If all you want is to see what is possible with Angular/Ionic/LB then this is a good course. If you really want to get deeper knowledge, then look elsewhere.

The con is that, during the course you are mainly following the author while he creates a LoopBack, an Angular and a Ionic application, going step by step.

Nevertheless, at the end of the course you will leave only with the idea of what can be done, but without having *learned* the concepts behind what is done.

In summary, you will learn the WHAT, but won't get into the WHY or the HOW of things.

If all you want is to see what is possible with Angular/Ionic/LB then this is a good course. If you really want to get deeper knowledge, then look elsewhere.

results.content: The Best Money I’ve Ever Spent!
Great to get started. Well done! =)

This course is just a simple walk-through of a very simple "app" many features are completely not mentioned, for instance how to allow users to edit only the items created by them self. 

Every aspect is not explained deeply but simply shown in the meanwhile the project is created. It is not so bad but to fully understand you must have already some knowledge of Angular, Ionic, API.

If you have some basics you can learn something ald follow the instructor without problems.

Not so bad but it could be much better
